articles.description: Residents of a community in central Germany have unexpectedly inherited property and a stock portfolio worth €6.2 million ($7.5 million), following the death of an elderly neighbor.

articles.description: Here's a head-scratcher: The use of cash has been declining for years in Britain, but demand for banknotes is skyrocketing. Nobody is quite sure where the money is going.

articles.description:
Queen Elizabeth II has lost another of her beloved dogs, British tabloid The Sun reports. 
Vulcan, a dorgi, is reported to have died at Windsor Castle, leaving the British monarch with just one remaining dog.
